tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ImageTransformationMatrices (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  matrix_1 FLOAT,
  matrix_2 FLOAT,
  matrix_3 FLOAT,
  matrix_4 FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ImageTransformations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT NOT NULL,
    transformation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transformation_details JSONB NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES ImageMatrices(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImageMetadata (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    image_size INT NOT NULL,
    image_format VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CorrectionHistory (
    correction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT NOT NULL,
    correction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    correction_data JSON NOT NULL,
    applied_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
